data.expected_result: The app opens without any issues
data.short_description: DiscordApp crashes for all Android versions between 4.x and 6.x after updating the App from v4.0.2 to v4.0.3
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in the Discord beta program and have the Discord version 4.0.2. - Try to update the app to the 4.0.3 version. - Observe that after the new version is installed you cannot use anymore the app. There's no way to do anything, and it simply crashes when you try to open it. - (optional) Reinstall the app and observe that the crashes doesn't occur anymore.
